meanings.definition: Situated or occurring behind the anus.
meanings.sent1: The postanal glands help with digestion after waste leaves the body.
meanings.sent2: The postanal region of the body is important for certain biological functions.
meanings.sent3: The postanal position of the chair made it uncomfortable for sitting.
meanings.sent4: Her postanal observations were always insightful, focusing on what came after.
meanings.sent5: The postanal location of the nest provided protection from predators.

meanings.definition: A structure or feature located behind the anus.
meanings.sent1: The bird's postanal feathers were colorful and unique.
